## Summary

- Describe the problem, request, or proposal.

## Suggested Labels

- Apply at least one type label: `bug`, `enhancement`, `documentation`, `question`, or `security`
- Add `new-skill` for new skill proposals
- Add one scope label when applicable: `area:repo`, `area:ci`, `area:docs`
- Add one skill label when the issue is mainly about one skill: `skill:repo-audit`, `skill:prd-decompose`, `skill:gha-create`
- Do not use legacy labels for new work: `skill:repo-public-readiness`, `skill:github-actions-hardening`, `skill:github-actions-standard`, `skill:github-actions-pro`
